remarks: A subclass relationship depends only on a relation's ordered pairs. Theorem 3.2(i) of [Monk1] p. 33.  (Contributed by NM, 2-Aug-1994.) (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 27-Aug-2011.)  (Revised by Thierry Arnoux, 6-Nov-2017.)
statement:
eqrelrd2.1 $e |- F/ x ph $.
eqrelrd2.2 $e |- F/ y ph $.
eqrelrd2.3 $e |- F/_ x A $.
eqrelrd2.4 $e |- F/_ y A $.
eqrelrd2.5 $e |- F/_ x B $.
eqrelrd2.6 $e |- F/_ y B $.
ssrelf $p |- ( Rel A -> ( A C_ B <-> A. x A. y ( <. x , y >. e. A -> <. x , y >. e. B ) ) ) $.
$d x y $.
